subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Southampton crushed visiting Sunderland, 8-0, in one of the biggest wins in the Premier League’s 22-year history, overshadowing Sergio Agüero’s four-goal haul in Manchester City’s thrashing of Tottenham on Saturday.
snippet: Southampton crushed visiting Sunderland, 8-0, in one of the biggest wins in the Premier League’s 22-year history, overshadowing Sergio Agüero’s four-goal haul in Manchester City’s thrashing of Tottenham on Saturday.
